alert.note: Alert for Northern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:56PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Rosebud and north central Treasure Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 755 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles north of Hysham, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall, winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rain will cause ponding of water on roadways and in low-lying areas. Locations impacted include... Ingomar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
